channel.title: How to add "owner adam has logged in" and "co-owner*** has logged in" [PI]
channel.description: hey, i downloaded a PI rsps and im wondering how to add a thing that sais "owner adam has logged in" and also for my co-owner "co-owner ***** has logged in" every time we log in.

item.title: How to add "owner adam has logged in" and "co-owner*** has logged in" [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:8, topic:448146”]Sorry, Adam. I didn’t mean to take my credits.

@OP, add the code in the Client class, then call the method in the destruct() and initialize() methods.[/quote]

You wish noob ;).

Read full topic

item.title: How to add "owner adam has logged in" and "co-owner*** has logged in" [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Illadelph, post:2, topic:448146”]*insert atrocious code here*

Heres a code for all the donars,mod,admin+
Just erase what you dont want also have to add

under public void initilialize() add

Sorry to the first code being screwed up like that and not paragraphed.[/quote]

/bad
There is no reason to use a switch statement and check the players rights every single time, and there was no point in using a for loop and iterating through the max players list 3 times. A for-each loop is a much more simplified version of a for loop.

private void message() { String[] allowed = { "mopar", "adam", "ryley", "cuz we both sexy"}; for (Player player : PlayerHandler.players) { if (player != null) { ((Client) player).sendMessage(!disconnected ? Misc.formatPlayerName(allowed[player.playerRights].toLowerCase()) + " has logged in." : Misc.formatPlayerName(allowed[player.playerRights].toLowerCase()) + " has logged out."); } } }

Use that in the login/logout voids.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add "owner adam has logged in" and "co-owner*** has logged in" [PI]

item.title: How to add "owner adam has logged in" and "co-owner*** has logged in" [PI]
item.dc:creator: @rscoder4life rscoder4life
item.description:
@rscoder4life wrote:

[quote=“Illadelph, post:2, topic:448146”]public void stafflogin(){ for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];if(playerRights == 0 && isDonator > 1){c2.sendMessage(" donor <img=0> " + playerName + " <img=0> has logged in.");}if(playerRights == 1){c2.sendMessage(" Moderator <img=1> " + playerName + " <img=1> has logged in.");}if(playerRights == 2){c2.sendMessage(" Administrator <img=2> " + playerName + " <img=2> has logged in.");}if(playerRights == 3){c2.sendMessage("OWNER <img=2> " + playerName + " <img=2> has logged in!");} }}

Heres a code for all the donars,mod,admin+
Just erase what you dont want also have to add

under public void initilialize() add

Sorry to the first code being screwed up like that and not paragraphed.[/quote]
i cant find the code, what file is it in?

what file do i search in?

Read full topic
